title: It's amazing how many ideas the community gives riot
body:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/1ExNNbtu-reminder-that-we-havent-gotten-our-summoner-report-cards-yet

And how much we fucking get ignored, why the fuck is this not a thing riot?

replies.body:
Iv gotten two instant feedback reports, a pop up in the client comes up and says a person you reported recently has had actions taken against them and asks you to click ok.

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/instant-feedback-powers

I think this is gonna be all we can get. But we do get rewarded well for being honored well.. like a day with a premade team honoring properly gives you a capsule the next day. but I get like key fragments almost every day now though for sportsman like behavior.

EDIT: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/IGf1NlbT-instant-feedback-report-8-times-in-one-sitting

the Edited part has this

>u arent fooling me friend :)

>you dont get that many people punished without doing some type of trolling. its fine i respect it. get those ragers out of the game!

But other then that fact is that feedback isn't good enough, we know it and riot know it.

> [{quoted}](name=Ailithic,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=3twEQAKE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-27T09:11:06.997+0000)
>
> I get like key fragments almost every day now though for sportsman like behavior.

Your cycle reset, it's diminishing over the month, just like old key drops. It just changed from random on win chance to bias for honour.

Which honestly makes no sense, and just results in getting huge drops of 4+ keys at the start of a cycle, and feeling like you get next to nothing for the rest of it...

But you know, Riot games is embracing that loot box craze.

Lootbox drama aside, the idea of the key fragment drop rate curve is so that you'll get about the same number of key fragments in a given cycle regardless of how many games you're playing. Casual players are going to get them less often but continue to receive them over the course of the cycle and visa versa. At least that was how I understood it when they first announced them. 

As far as how it panned out in execution I couldn't say Personally I tend to forget about my chests until the cycle resets and I'm getting keys again so it doesn't really bother me,
